content: जठर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जायते जंतुर्गर्भो वास्मिन् जन्-अर ठांत देशः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Hard, stiff, firm. {@--2@} Old. {@--3@} Bound, tied. --रः, --रं {@--1@} The stomach, belly, abdomen; जठरं को न बिभर्ति केवलं <ls>Pt. 1. 22.</ls> {@--2@} The womb. {@--3@} A hole, cavity. {@--4@} The interior of anything. {@--5@} The bosom. {@--6@} Morbid affection of the bowels.
